name: Lovely Lisa
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Fashion is fun with Lisa!



Lovely Lisa helps younger girls learn the importance of having fun and working hard while finding their own fashion style! Earn Lisa-points by perfecting beauty skills & techniques and helping out around the house. Prove you've got what it takes in the Heart Hills pageant. Only the girl with the best skills in all categories can win - after all, beauty is only skin deep!
